hero.title: Your ally against fake news on Discord
hero.subtitle: Newman is a bot that helps your community verify information, analyze images, and fight misinformation using artificial intelligence.

items.title: Fact-checking
items.description: Analyzes claims and searches multiple sources to tell if something is true, false, or questionable.

items.title: Image analysis
items.description: Examines photos and memes, detects manipulations, and explains the context behind the content.

items.title: Smart search
items.description: Searches the web and evaluates source credibility, always citing where the information came from.

items.title: Natural conversation
items.description: Answers questions directly, without fluff, remembering context from previous conversations.

commands.title: Commands
commands.subtitle: Simple and straight to the point

support.title: Support the project
support.subtitle: Newman is free and open source. If you want to help keep the project alive:

coffee.title: Buy me a coffee
coffee.description: Your contribution helps pay for server costs and development.

community.title: Community
community.description: Join Discord to ask questions, give suggestions, or just chat.

items.question: How do I add Newman to my server?
items.answer: Click the 'Add to Discord' button on this site. You'll be redirected to Discord to choose your server and grant permissions.

items.question: Is it free?
items.answer: Yes, completely free. If you want to help with costs, you can contribute via Buy Me a Coffee.

items.question: Does it work in Portuguese?
items.answer: Yes! Newman was built for Brazilian communities and responds naturally in Portuguese.

items.question: Is it always accurate?
items.answer: No system is perfect. Newman is a tool to help, but always use critical thinking too.

items.question: Is my data saved?
items.answer: We only store context from recent conversations to give better answers. Nothing is sold or shared.

content.intro: This policy explains how Newman Bot collects and uses your information.

sections.title: What we collect
sections.content: We collect only what's necessary: your Discord ID for conversation context, message content when you use the bot, and channel IDs. We don't collect personal data beyond what Discord provides.

sections.title: How we use it
sections.content: We use data only to make the bot work: answer your questions, maintain context, and improve the service. We don't sell or share anything.

sections.title: Retention
sections.content: We only keep the last 15 messages per user and 20 per channel, temporarily. Inactive data is automatically deleted.

sections.title: Your rights
sections.content: You can request deletion of your data at any time. Just stop using the bot and everything is automatically cleaned.

sections.title: Contact
sections.content: Questions? Contact Lucas Henry via GitHub or Discord.

content.intro: By using Newman Bot, you agree to these terms.

sections.title: The service
sections.content: Newman is a Discord bot that offers fact-checking, image analysis, web search, and AI chat. The service is provided as-is and may change at any time.

sections.title: Allowed use
sections.content: Don't use the bot for illegal activities, spam, exploitation attempts, or to spread misinformation on purpose. Also respect Discord's Terms.

sections.title: Limitations
sections.content: Newman provides educational information. We don't guarantee 100% accuracy. Always verify critical information yourself.

sections.title: Liability
sections.content: Newman and its creator are not responsible for decisions made based on the bot's information.

sections.title: Contact
sections.content: Questions about the terms? Contact Lucas Henry via GitHub or Discord.
